easy-questions_key2:
If 20 articles cost ₹ 90, then the cost of 9 articles is ?

     A. ₹ 45
     B. ₹ 40.50
     C. ₹ 4.50
     D. None of these
easy-questions_key3:
If cost of 24 oranges is ₹ 72, then find out the cost of 120 oranges.

     A. ₹ 180
     B. ₹ 360
     C. ₹ 172
     D. ₹ 500
easy-questions_key4:
If cost of 12 pens is ₹ 84, then what is the cost of 10 such pens ?

     A. ₹ 90
     B. ₹ 72
     C. ₹ 65
     D.₹ 70
easy-questions_key5:
If cost of 15 eggs is ₹ 75, then find out the cost of 4 dozens eggs.

     A. ₹ 240
     B. ₹ 300
     C. ₹ 150
     D. ₹ 185
easy-questions_key6:
If 16 dozens bananas cost ₹ 360, then how many bananas can be bought in ₹ 60 ?

     A. 16 bananas
     B. 48 bananas
     C. 32 bananas
     D. 50 bananas
easy-questions_key7:
A worker makes a toy in every 2h. If he works for 80h, then how many toys will he make ?

     A. 40
     B. 54
     C. 45
     D. 39
easy-questions_key8:
In a race, Ravi covers 5 km in 20 min. How much distance will the cover in 100 min?

     A. 40 Km
     B. 35 km
     C. 26 km
     D. 25 km
easy-questions_key9:
A tree is 12 m tall and casts an 8m long shadow. At the same time,a flag pole caste a 100 m long shadow. How long is the flag pole?

     A. 150 m
     B. 200 m
     C. 125 m
     D. 115 m
easy-questions_key10: In a dairy farm, 40 cows eat 40 bags of husk in 40 days. In how many days one cow will eat one bag of husk?
easy-questions_key11: An industrial loom weaves 0.128 meters of cloth every second.Approximately.how many seconds will it take for the loom to weave 25 metre of cloth?
easy-questions_key12: If 8 men can reap 80 hectares in 24 days.then how many hectares can 36 men reap in 30 days?
easy-questions_key13: If  the price of 23 toys is Rs.276, then what will the price(INR) of 12 toys?
easy-questions_key14: 12 farmers harvest the crops in the field in20 hours. How many workers will be required to do the same work in 15 hours.
easy-questions_key15: 2 men or 3 women can earn $ 192 in a day. Find how much 5 men and 7women will earn in a day?
easy-questions_key16: The weight of 56 books is 8 kg. What is the weight of 152 such books? How many such books weigh 5 kg?
easy-questions_key17: John types 450 words in half an hour. How words would he type in 7 minutes.
easy-questions_key18: A worker is paid Rs. 750 for 6 days work. If he works for 23 days,how much will he get?
